mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO race ( raceName, raceType, raceLength, clockwise, raceCondition, raceWeather, grade, raceDate ) VALUES ( #{race.raceName}, #{race.raceType.value}, #{race.raceLength}, #{race.clockwise.value}, #{race.raceCondition.value}, #{race.raceWeather.value}, #{race.grade.value}, #{race.raceDate} )
